  • Method Details

    • show

      public void show()
      Shows the previously created window.

    • cancel

      private void cancel()
      Used to cancel the authentication (e.g. when the button "cancel" is pressed).

    • anonSignIn

      private void anonSignIn()
      Used to sign the user in anonymously.

    • codeSignIn

      private void codeSignIn​(java.lang.String code)
      Used to validate a code got from signing the user in.
      Parameters:
      code - The code from authenticating the user, according to OAuth2.

    • signedIn

      private void signedIn​(Credentials credentials)
      Called by anonSignIn() and codeSignIn(String).
      Parameters:
      credentials - The credentials used to continue.

    • refreshToken

      public static java.lang.String refreshToken​(java.lang.String oldToken)
      Refreshes the token according to OAuth2 specifications.
      Parameters:
      oldToken - The old token.
      Returns:
      The new/refreshed token.

    • getUserFromToken

      public static MWUser getUserFromToken​(java.lang.String token)
      Verify a token and get the user's details.
      Parameters:
      token - The OAuth2 token.
      Returns:
      The user details or null;

    • getAccessToken

      public static TokenRes getAccessToken​(java.lang.String code)
      Get a token from an OAuth2 code.
      Parameters:
      code - The code.
      Returns:
      The token or null.
